fullText: This musical about cheerleaders who withhold sex until their basketball team starts winning is surprisingly sweet and funny, with a terrific cast led by Patti Murin.
dtliExcerpt: This musical about cheerleaders who withhold sex until their basketball team starts winning is surprisingly sweet and funny, with a terrific cast led by Patti Murin.
bwwExcerpt: A lot of people whine that Broadway doesn’t know how to make entertaining musicals anymore. Happily, it turns out that Broadway still knows how to make ’em. With its catchy pop score, charming cast, zippy staging and wickedly funny book, “Lysistrata Jones” is one of the season’s tastiest pieces of candy. Sadly, it’s also one of the most underbuzzed.
